org.apache.juneau.microservice

Class Resource

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • org.apache.juneau.server.RestServlet
          • org.apache.juneau.server.RestServletDefault
            • org.apache.juneau.microservice.Resource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Servlet, ServletConfig
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConfigResource, DirectoryResource, LogsResource, ShutdownResource

    @RestResource(properties=@Property(name="HtmlDocSerializer.links.map",value="{up:\'$R{requestParentURI}\',options:\'$R{servletURI}?method=OPTIONS\'}"),
              config="$S{juneau.configFile}",
              stylesheet="$C{REST/stylesheet,styles/juneau.css}")
public abstract class Resource
extends RestServletDefault
    Superclass for all REST resources.

    In additional to the functionality of the RestServletDefault group, augments the createVarResolver() method with the following additional variable types:

    • $ARG{...} - Command line arguments pulled from Microservice.getArgs().
      Example:

      String firstArg = request.getVarResolver().resolve("$ARG{0}"); // First argument. String namedArg = request.getVarResolver().resolve("$ARG{myarg}"); // Named argument (e.g. "myarg=foo").

    • $MF{...} - Manifest file entries pulled from Microservice.getManifest().
      Example:

      String mainClass = request.getVarResolver().resolve("$MF{Main-Class}"); // Main class.

    Author:
    James Bognar (james.bognar@salesforce.com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
